remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法，可讓裝置配接器發出標記，以便開始及結束使用指定樣式的格式設定字元的區塊。The and methods allow a device adapter to emit markup, in order to begin and end a block using the character formatting from a given style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編碼涉及對應至適當的字元程式碼的 HTML/WML 意義的字元。Encoding involves mapping characters with HTML/WML meanings to the appropriate character code.
